title: Should I buy 4G phone or wait or 5G? - Quora

response.answer_text: The question is that what will you use 5G for.. to be honest alot of the unlimited plans now are successful because people stream alot of data. However, a majority of people use data savers or their provider throttles their speeds to ~3 mbps depending on factors… and they are STILL fine… MOST internet apps will work with that speed… AND what most people don’t think about is that is actually in the range of 3G speeds…. I can see no conceivable reason why 5G is a must , right now OR in the near immediate future….. now maybe four years from when i’m writing this you “may” need 5G for some weird reason… as everyone is streaming VR broadcasts and interactive simulations in 4k or 8k… but you’ll probably be onto your second or even third phone by then. Hope this helps… :)

It all comes down to your requirement and how long you’ll be using the phone. If you’re planning to use the phone for short term then 4G is a better option. If you’re planning to use the phone for long then go checkout the 5G phones you’re interested in. Also check if 5G is available in your area, if not then when is it expected, for example the latest India will get 5G is by 2022 and no sooner. 5G doesn’t have good penetration capabilities, so before using it, it’ll be hard to comment on it. But you’ll be able to use 5G with better speeds compared to 4G but if you’re looking for a significant speed difference then they’ll be hard to get cause of the penetration capabilities. However if the phone you’re interested is only available in 5G then go for it.
